author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Hochdorf Holding FY Net Profit At CHF 40.8 Mln
text:
April 5 (Reuters) - HOCHDORF HOLDING AG:
* FY ‍NET SALES REVENUE BY 10.9 PERCENT TO CHF 600.5 MILLION​
* APPLYING FOR A SLIGHT INCREASE IN DIVIDEND PAYMENT FROM CHF 3.80 TO CHF 4.00 PER REGISTERED SHARE​
* FY ‍NET PROFIT, AT CHF 40.8 MILLION, MORE THAN DOUBLED COMPARED WITH PREVIOUS YEAR​
* FY ‍EBIT UP BY 89.7 PERCENT​ * ‍FOR 2018, HOCHDORF GROUP IS EXPECTING NET SALES REVENUE IN REGION OF CHF 600 - 630 MILLION​
* OUTLOOK 2018: ‍ON EARNINGS FRONT, EXPECTS PROPORTIONAL EBIT IN RELATION TO PRODUCTION REVENUE TO BE 7.0 - 7.5 PERCENT (PY 7.1 PERCENT)​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
